title: Value, virtue, purpose and meaning - Voices with Vervaeke
description: I join my hosts Gregg Henriques and Greg Thomas and my fellow discussant Steve McIntosh at Peter Limberg's The Stoa for a powerful dia logos about dia logos, agape, reverence, purpose, and meaning in life.
